title: When will Arcade Miss Fortune come back on sale again?
body:
Arcade Miss Fortune is the skin i really, really want but i don't know when its going to come back on sale? If anybody does know please comment down below to tell me.

Thanks

replies.body:
Greetings azinlazor,

Miss Fortune was recently on sale (about 125 days ago), so it's unlikely that she'll be on sale in the near future. She's available in the store, and if you're short RP, you can always sign up for free tournaments via the Event Finder/Community Events page ;)
